name: The Minotaur
true_name: Asterion ("Starry One") - a name shared with Minos's stepfather
nature: half-bull - with the head and tail of a bull upon a massive human body; a creature of unnatural birth
origin: Born of Queen Pasiphae and the Cretan Bull
through Poseidon's curse upon King Minos
dwelling: The Labyrinth at Knossos - an inescapable maze constructed by Daedalus
